name: Clusterio
author: psychoalex@thevcbc.com
description:
a generic node.js egg

This will clone a git repo. it defaults to master if no branch is specified.

Installs the node_modules on install. If you set user_upload then I assume you know what you are doing.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Clusterio Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "assuming user knows what they are doing have a good day."
    exit 0
fi

case "${SERVER_MODE}" in

  "master")
    echo -e "Initialising Clustorio In Master mode"
        npm init "@clusterio" --allow-install-as-root --mode "${SERVER_MODE}" --download-headless --log-level "${LOG_LEVEL}" --admin "${ADMIN_STRING}" --public-address "${SERVER_IP}":"${SERVER_PORT}" --plugins ${PLUGINS}
	;;

  "slave")
    echo -e "Initialising Clustorio In Slave mode"
	npm init "@clusterio" --allow-install-as-root --mode "${SERVER_MODE}" --download-headless --log-level "${LOG_LEVEL}" --slave-name "${SLAVE_NAME}" --public-address "${SERVER_IP}" --master-url "${MASTER_URL}" --master-token "${MASTER_TOKEN}" --plugins ${PLUGINS}
    ;;
    
esac

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
